comments.body:
In this case it looks like you can just directly export things.
E.g.:
```ts
export const memoizePath: boolean; // or `export let` if mutable
export function exists(obj: object, path: DottiePath): boolean;
```

Actually doing this causes problems with the linter due to having a method called `default`.

I worked around that by doing:
```
declare function _default(...): any;
export { _default as default };
```

But this fails the linter.

This was one of the reasons I ended up with this structure.
Technically you could do `export default`, but since the intention doesn't seem to have been to make a default export, I guess it's better to leave it as is.
